characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Twice per game, Nitnuckle and Lunk can assist their master in making repairs.  When they do so, the vehicle that Buzzgob is repairing regains one additional wound.  When rolling to wound this unit, always use Buzzgob's Toughness (While it is on the battlefield). The death of Nitnuckle and/or Lunk is ignored for the purposes of morale.
